1448320.name: Boat Warfare
1448320.description:
Embark on a High-Stakes Mission

Take command of Acirema's cutting-edge, AI-piloted drone boat and undertake a crucial mission: infiltrate behind the enemy lines of the tyrannical nations: The Anihc and The Aissur, uncover their sinister plans and put a stop to them before they can strike the Unified Territories of Acirema and its allies and destroy the world!

Dive Into an Epic Storyline

Immerse yourself in multiple story chapters that will take you through an exhilarating adventure of a lifetime. Navigate unique environments and battle dangerous foes, all while receiving radio commentary from captivating characters like Radio Guy and Pilot.

Fight Against Malevolent Forces

Battle the evil nations bent on destroying Acirema and save the world in this thrilling 3rd person action-packed saga!

KEY FEATURES

  • Dynamic Environments: Engage in thrilling battles across diverse environments, facing a wide array of enemies. Each setting offers unique challenges, ensuring every encounter is exhilarating and immersive.

  • Intense Combat: Take control of the AI-piloted boat, capable of performing maneuvers beyond human limits. Experience smooth, responsive movement and satisfying shooting mechanics as you navigate through levels teeming with formidable adversaries.

  • Captivating Storyline: Embark on a gripping journey in Boat Warfare, spanning five action-packed chapters. Explore new and exciting locations, and brace yourself for unexpected twists and turns that will make you say what the hell is next???

  • Arcade Mode: Need a break from the story? Dive into Arcade Mode for classic wave-based firefights. Battle against all the enemies featured in the game, including epic boss fights, for endless hours of intense action.
1448320.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
